mapper.sql: SELECT id , username , password , nickname , profile_img , currency # , provider "provider" # , providerId "providerId" FROM USER WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(username, password, nickname, profile_img, currency) VALUE(#{username},#{password},#{nickname},#{profile_img},#{currency})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET nickname = #{nickname}, profile_img = #{profile_img}, currency = #{currency} WHERE id = #{id}
